FuncDef: The display ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command displays statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses.
CLIs: display ipv6 nd source-mac statistics [ interface { <interface-name> | <interface-type> <interface-num> } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
-

Specifies the type and number of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-insensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.

Examples: SourceMac            Interface         Dropped NS   Dropped NA   Dropped RS   Dropped RA
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check statistics about dropped ND attack messages with fixed source MAC addresses, run the display ipv6 nd source-mac statistics command.
